tick() - Method in class gremlins.Snowflake
Initially spawns snowflake after 8 seconds, checks for collected, will make the snowflake later respawn after collected.
tick() - Method in class gremlins.Wizard
Moves the wizard, ensures that when buttons are released, it is moved to a whole tile, and checks for gremlin, slime, door, portal, and snowflake collisions.
